page.title: 10Recreation in Kennoway
page.content:
In recent years in the village there has been increasing interest in recreation for people of all ages. Here is a sample of what is available.
{ DIARY { ===== {Mon:}Sandy Brae Centre - 18th Fife Scouts and Cubs {Tue:}Community Hall - Judo: Kennoway Judo Association {Wed:}Community Hall - Highland Dance Smart Hall - 1st Kennoway Girls Brigade {Thu:}Smart Hall - 2nd Kennoway Guides and Brownies Community Hall - Judo {Fri:}Smart Hall - Kennoway Boys Brigade
There are also three football teams which play in local leagues.
